ABOUT

I am an entrepreneur working on making well-designed physical objects at TOC, the first of which is a map of San Francisco. Before I withdrew from school last year to start TOC, I was a sophomore at Peking University in Beijing, where I studied Biology. On the right is my wonderful wife and frequent collaborator (when she isn't busy in lab), Shan.

I like climbing (mostly at Mission Cliffs), eating at Z&Y, and bargaining in places where it isn't normally acceptable.

If you'd like to get in touch, you can email hi@wheatpond.com, or message me at @wheatpond.
